title: The Charter of the United Nations
creator_credit: Crown Film Unit and Alexander Shaw
brief_description: An explanation of the structure and the purposes of the United Nations Organization, showing the General Assembly, the Security Council, and the various commissions set up to further the cause of world peace and well-being. Commentary by Francis Williams.
